subject: Hazing
Soccer
College Athletics
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The Humboldt State president, Rollin Richmond, suspended the men’s soccer team for the academic year as a result of a new-recruit hazing ritual involving most of the team’s players.
snippet: The Humboldt State president, Rollin Richmond, suspended the men’s soccer team for the academic year as a result of a new-recruit hazing ritual involving most of the team’s players.
